name: Chair Fletcher to Deliver State of County Address Tuesday
description: County Board of Supervisors Chair Nathan Fletcher will deliver his second State of the County Address on Tuesday, March 29.
keywords: second state of the county address

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
County Board of Supervisors Chair Nathan Fletcher will deliver his second State of the County Address on Tuesday, March 29. His speech will focus on regional issues such as homelessness, housing, mental health and public safety.
The live broadcast of the event starts at 6:10 p.m. and will be translated into American Sign Language.
The public can watch the address in a variety of ways:

County of San Diego YouTube Page
County of San Diego Facebook Page
County of San Diego Twitter Page  
County of San Diego Vimeo Live Stream Page
CW Network San Diego (Check local listings)
Azteca 33 San Diego with Spanish translation
Univision San Diego’s Facebook Page with Spanish translation

The speech will also be broadcast with live interpretation in Arabic, Chinese, Filipino, Spanish and Vietnamese through Zoom.
The invitation-only event is taking place at a location with limited capacity, the Educational Cultural Complex Performing Arts Theatre at the San Diego Continuing Education Center.
The address will be rebroadcast on CNC TV on the following dates and times:

March 30 – 10 a.m. and 8 p.m.
April 1 – 10 a.m. and 8 p.m.
April 2 – Noon and 8 p.m.
April 3 – Noon and 8 p.m.
